casebody.data:
Caroline HIRSCHFELD
v.
Robert B. MACHINIST Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 27, 2018

Kenneth A. Votre, New Haven, in support of the petition.

Kenneth J. Bartschi and Dana M. Hrelic, Hartford, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 181 Conn. App. 309, 186 A.3d 770 (2018), is denied.
